00014 template<typename M, typename B, typename J>
00015 class RefLocalOperator : 
00016   public Dune::PDELab::NumericalJacobianApplyVolume<RefLocalOperator<M, B, J> >,
00017   public Dune::PDELab::NumericalJacobianVolume<RefLocalOperator<M, B, J> >,
00018   public Dune::PDELab::NumericalJacobianApplyBoundary<RefLocalOperator<M, B, J> >,
00019   public Dune::PDELab::NumericalJacobianBoundary<RefLocalOperator<M, B, J> >, 
00020   public Dune::PDELab::FullVolumePattern,
00021   public Dune::PDELab::LocalOperatorDefaultFlags
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   // pattern assembly flags
00025   enum { doPatternVolume = true };
00026 
00027   // residual assembly flags
00028   enum { doAlphaVolume = true };
00029   enum { doAlphaBoundary = true };                                // assemble boundary
00030 
00031   // constructor parametrized by regions and boundary classes
00032   RefLocalOperator (const M& m_, const B& b_, const J& j_, unsigned int intorder_=2) 
00033     : m(m_), b(b_), j(j_), intorder(intorder_)  // needs boundary cond. type
00034   {}
00035 
00036   // volume integral depending on test and ansatz functions
00037   template<typename EG, typename LFSU, typename X, typename LFSV, typename R>
00038   void alpha_volume (const EG& eg, const LFSU& lfsu, const X& x, const LFSV& lfsv, R& r) const
00039   {
00040     // extract some types
00041     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00042       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::DomainFieldType DF;
00043     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00044       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeFieldType RF;
00045     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00046       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::JacobianType JacobianType;
00047     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00048       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeType RangeType;
00049     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::SizeType size_type;
00050         
00051     // dimensions
00052     const int dim = EG::Geometry::dimension;
00053     const int dimw = EG::Geometry::dimensionworld;
00054 
00055     // select quadrature rule
00056     Dune::GeometryType gt = eg.geometry().type();
00057     const Dune::QuadratureRule<DF,dim>& 
00058       rule = Dune::QuadratureRules<DF,dim>::rule(gt,intorder);
00059 
00060     //lfsu.debug();
00061       
00062     // loop over quadrature points
00063     for (typename Dune::QuadratureRule<DF,dim>::const_iterator 
00064            it=rule.begin(); it!=rule.end(); ++it)
00065       {
00066         // evaluate basis functions on reference element
00067         std::vector<RangeType> phi(lfsu.size());
00068         lfsu.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(it->position(),phi);
00069 
00070         // compute u at integration point
00071         RF u=0.0;
00072         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00073           u += x[i]*phi[i];
00074 
00075         // evaluate gradient of basis functions on reference element
00076         std::vector<JacobianType> js(lfsu.size());
00077         lfsu.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(it->position(),js);
00078 
00079         // transform gradients from reference element to real element
00080         const Dune::FieldMatrix<DF,dimw,dim> 
00081           jac = eg.geometry().jacobianInverseTransposed(it->position());
00082         std::vector<Dune::FieldVector<RF,dim> > gradphi(lfsu.size());
00083         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00084           jac.mv(js[i][0],gradphi[i]);
00085         
00086         // compute gradient of u
00087         Dune::FieldVector<RF,dim> gradu(0.0);
00088         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00089           gradu.axpy(x[i],gradphi[i]);
00090 
00091         // evaluate parameters; 
00092         Dune::FieldVector<RF,dim> 
00093         globalpos = eg.geometry().global(it->position());
00094 
00095         // Parameters describing the PDE
00096         RF f = -1.0 * sysParams.get_lambda2i() * sinh(u);
00097         RF a = 0.0; 
00098 
00099         // integrate grad u * grad phi_i + a*u*phi_i - f phi_i
00100         RF factor = it->weight()*eg.geometry().integrationElement(it->position());
00101 
00102         // choose correct metric for integration (depending on symmetry)
00103         RF metric;
00104         switch ( sysParams.get_symmetry() )
00105         {
00106                 case 1: metric = 1.0; break; // "2D_cylinder"
00107                 case 2: metric = globalpos[1]*2.0*sysParams.pi; break;   // "2D_sphere"
00108                 case 3: metric = 1.0; break; // "3D"
00109                 default:    metric = 0.0; std::cerr << "Error: Could not detect metric" << std::endl;
00110         }
00111         // Integration with added term for metric
00112         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00113           r[i] += ( gradu*gradphi[i] + a*u*phi[i] - f*phi[i] )*factor*metric;
00114       }
00115   }
00116 
00117   // boundary integral
00118   template<typename IG, typename LFSU, typename X, typename LFSV, typename R>
00119   void alpha_boundary (const IG& ig, const LFSU& lfsu_s, const X& x_s, 
00120                        const LFSV& lfsv_s, R& r_s) const
00121   {
00122     // some types
00123     typedef typename LFSV::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00124       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::DomainFieldType DF;
00125     typedef typename LFSV::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00126       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeFieldType RF;
00127     typedef typename LFSV::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00128       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeType RangeType;
00129     typedef typename LFSV::Traits::SizeType size_type;
00130     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00131       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::JacobianType JacobianType;
00132         
00133     // dimensions
00134     const int dim = IG::dimension;
00135        
00136     // select quadrature rule for face
00137     Dune::GeometryType gtface = ig.geometryInInside().type();
00138     const Dune::QuadratureRule<DF,dim-1>& 
00139       rule = Dune::QuadratureRules<DF,dim-1>::rule(gtface,intorder);
00140 
00141     // loop over quadrature points and integrate normal flux
00142     for (typename Dune::QuadratureRule<DF,dim-1>::const_iterator it=rule.begin(); 
00143          it!=rule.end(); ++it)
00144       {
00145         // evaluate boundary condition type
00146         typename B::Traits::RangeType bctype;
00147         b.evaluate(ig,it->position(),bctype);
00148  
00149         // skip rest if we are on Dirichlet boundary
00150         if (bctype>0) continue;
00151 
00152         // position of quadrature point in local coordinates of element 
00153         Dune::FieldVector<DF,dim> local = ig.geometryInInside().global(it->position());
00154 
00155         // evaluate basis functions at integration point
00156         std::vector<RangeType> phi(lfsv_s.size());
00157         lfsu_s.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(local,phi);
00158         
00159         // evaluate flux boundary condition
00160         typename J::Traits::RangeType y;
00161         j.evaluate(ig, it, y);
00162         
00163         // integrate j
00164         RF factor = it->weight()*ig.geometry().integrationElement(it->position());
00165 
00166         // choose correct metric for integration (depending on symmetry)
00167         RF metric;
00168         switch ( sysParams.get_symmetry() )
00169         {
00170                 case 1: metric = 1.0; break; // "2D_cylinder"
00171                 case 2: metric = local[1]*2.0*sysParams.pi; break;   // "2D_sphere"
00172                 case 3: metric = 1.0; break; // "3D"
00173                 default:    metric = 0.0; std::cerr << "Error: Could not detect metric" << std::endl;
00174         }
00175         // Integration with added term for metric
00176         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsv_s.size(); i++)
00177           r_s[i] += y*phi[i]*factor*metric;
00178       }
00179   }
00180   
00181 private:
00182   const M& m;
00183   const B& b;
00184   const J& j;
00185   unsigned int intorder;
00186 };
